meanings.definition: A glandular groove in the floor of the pharynx of tunicates and some cephalochordates.
meanings.sent1: The endostyle helps in filtering food particles.

meanings.definition: A ciliated groove in the floor of the pharynx of some invertebrates.
meanings.sent1: Tiny hairs line the endostyle to help with movement.
meanings.sent2: The endostyle's cilia create a current to capture food particles.
